basic_info.description: I'm Obi, a Front-End Web Developer from Houston, Texas. When I'm not meddling with a sudoku puzzle or immersing myself in a novel, I enjoy sharpening my skills in frameworks like React, Angluar and Vue. I am a firm believer in the ideology "You are always a student, never a master", and as such, I embrace every opportunity to further my knowledge and learn something new. I am as enthralled by nature as I am technology, you can find me under a tree in my spare time.

projects.title: Crwn-Clothing
projects.description: This project has been one of the most complex applications that I have had the opportunity to work with. Firebase, Routing, Authentication, React, Redux, phew! I had to push myself to not only implememnt, but really understand everything I was dealing with here. I am currently building this website as a part of Andrei Neagoie of Zero to Mastery academy's brilliant course.

projects.title: TinDog
projects.description: A website for all the dog lovers <3 ...literally! A very interesting dive into web design, coded as a tutorial for a course taught by Angela Yu

projects.title: Simon Says
projects.description: A very fun little implementation of the classic Hasbro Simon Says game. Made with javascript, jQuery, and some CSS; I found this to be an interesting challenge put forth by Angela Yu from the London App Brewery

experience.description: Throughout my time as a web developer, I have learned to utilize my knowledge of the latest software and project application trends to better provide quality service while maintaining site applicability. I have planned website development and converted mock-ups into usable web pages using my knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, JSX, and CSS. I also routinely leverage the React JavaScript library to create dynamic websites and web applications.
experience.title: Front-End Web Developer

experience.description: I like to think back on this period as when I "cut my web-dev teeth" so to speak. I Maintained full-time employment while educating myself on one of the most popular JavaScript libraries. At work I displayed superior oral communication skills and an ability to communicate effectively with both customers and colleagues. I was responsible for assisting the guests needs, and responding to their inquiries. My time in customer service fostered my ability to understand exigencies and address any and all concerns
experience.title: Self Taught React Student/ Shift Lead
